title: give IRELIA a skin or reword her soon
body: near 2 years from last skin, she is a popular champion, so give her a skin or  rework her instead waste time with galio and urgot no one will play them anyway

replies.body: Order of the Lotus was 2 years ago? man, time passes fast.

I guess you should....reword the title of the thread...


Anyway,she is pretty high on the update list and could be one of the next reworks after Urgot and Eve.

Apparently, reworked Warwick is being played a lot compared to old Warwick. So technically, there's still hope for Galio & Urgot.

Irelia on the other hand needs nerfs, not skin/rework.

I play Galio when I am mid and my team needs a tank. Great early game as a poke mage, great late game as a supportive tank.

RoA, abyssal, spirit visage for long laning phase games or if you are winning hard.

RoA, spirit visage, abyssal for short laning phases.

Catalyst, spectre's cowl, RoA, spirit visage if you are losing lane.

Early seeker's, wardens mail, or chain vest if you are vs ad. Wardens has the qorst synergy with your ult but omen active helps you stick and cdr from heart are both good. Seekers lets you be more offensive. Sunfire gives more damage on your ult and while you peel/frontline. Dead mans helps get in for your ulti. Just whatever you like more.
